content: “We must create a student loan servicing environment that provides the highest quality customer service and increases accountability and transparency for all borrowers, while also limiting the cost to taxpayers,” DeVos said. That is why pussygrabber spends over $10,000,000 EACH WEEKEND playing golf at one of his clubs whiile counting the money; why melanoma spends $150,000 per day on Secret Service and $500,000 per day from City of New York….they are so fiscally conscious…NOT!…SAD! LIARS!!!
